titles.title: Jesus our savior kind and good

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus our savior kind and good newline was born in a manger of staw and woods newline and the friendly beasts around him stood newline Jesus our savior kind and good

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "I" said the donkey shaggy and rown newline "I carried His mother up hill and down newline I carried her safely to Bethlehem town" newline "I" said the doneky shaggy and brown

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "I" said the bow all white and red newline "I gave Him my manger for a bed newline I gave Him my hay to pillow His head newline "I" said the cow all white and red

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "I" said the sheed with the curly horn newline "I gave Him my wool for a blanket warm newline And he wore my coat on that Christmas morn newline "I" said the sheep with the curly horn

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: "I" said the dove from the rafters high newline "I cooed Him to sleep so He would not cry newline We cooed Him to sleep my mate and I newline "I" said the dove form my rafters high
